description: to turn, to face (a direction), to turn toward, to turn away, to turn aside, to look; the action of directing oneself or one's attention toward or away from something. Etymologically related to panim (face) - the verb means to turn one's face/attention toward something. Often used with directional prepositions: el (toward), min (from/away from).

stems.hiphil: to face (something), to cause to change the direction something is facing
